title: Can't update to 7.17
body: I've tried three times now to update my league client to 7.17. It has failed all three times. I'm in my fourth try currently. (6:21 pm august 23rd 2017 eastern time) the past two times I've tried the current megabytes went over the amount of megabytes it says the update was (for example 79 mb/ 64 mb) now the past two times since I just finished the fourth try it says it's trying to reconnect me. I really want to play ornn and now I can't because I can't even update my league. Please help

replies.body: Let's try forcing that patch to go through manually to see if that works! Grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with **Force Repatch** turned on. If that doesn't work, let's push it a little harder by using that tool to run a **reinstall and clean uninstall**. Let me know if either of these help or not!
Sorry I didn't respond sooner but later on that day i was able to finally finish the install. Thank you though.
